name: Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon Girl
text:
Blue-Eyes Dark Dragoon Girl + Ancient Dark Magician Girl + Ancient Blue-Eyes White Dragon
This card can only be summoned by fusing the above materials using the effect of "Ancient Power Released". When this card is Fusion Summoned, you can add 1 "Ancient" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. Monsters your opponents control lose 200 ATK/DEF for every "Ancient" monster in your GY. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect, you can discard 1 card; negate that activation and banish it. Your opponent cannot target monsters you control for attacks or with card effects, except this card.
